com.dotmarketing.business

Class DotJBCacheAdministratorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
      • com.dotmarketing.business.DotJBCacheAdministratorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DotCacheAdministrator, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener, org.jgroups.Receiver

    public class DotJBCacheAdministratorImpl
extends org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
implements DotCacheAdministrator
    The legacy cache administrator will invalidate cache entries within a cluster on a put where the non legacy one will not.
    Version:
    1.6.5
    Author:
    Jason Tesser
